channel.title: A search bar for chat history
channel.description: I'd imagine it working something like ctrl f. Sifting through chat history is tedious and unfun especially if your computer isn't that great so it can't scroll as smoothly.

item.title: A search bar for chat history
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
This would be a cool feature but probably won’t happen anytime soon because Boslof says that coding chat features is a pain in the ass

I have no relevant experience, but I find that claim easy to believe

Read full topic
item.source: A search bar for chat history
